package.description: uniform_feat_tracker : This module uses uniform_feat_extractor and trackes its outputs while making outlier elimination using the constraints exposed by flow continuity and trend in the totality of the flow field. History of the flow field is stored to be used in bundle adjustment and visualization. New features add uniformly over the image as others are eliminated. This node implements a class and a sample application.
